response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $12,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value we receive for such a high-quality asset. We understand its worth to you is $8,000, but we hope this proposal will be agreeable to both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
